adDetails: Multiple insurance protections: $2,000,000 General Liability Insurance, $750,000 Auto Insurance, $1,000,000 Workers' Comp Insurance, and $20,000 cargo insurance. >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> Reliable Professional Moving Services: * Highly experienced movers * Careful, efficient and friendly * Everyday low flat rates * Fully equipped professional moving truck Our Rates: (included 24 ft truck) $65/hr for 2 movers $85/hr for 3 movers * FREE Use of Moving Materials * FREE Estimates * FREE Basic Insurance Coverage * FREE Disassembly and Reassembly of furnitures * FREE Professional Wrapping Please contact us now!!! show contact info
